First, is there a tutorial on how to make IVAs?

And second, is it possible to freeze the kerbal animations when in IVA?

Finally, where are the 3D models for the kerbals located?

Thanks again for your help.

1. Yes

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/45070-TT-s-IVA-Tutorial

it's a bit of trial and error for the 1st time, after that it's easy to follow the same pattern.

2. Not that I know of.

3. No one knows.
